content:
Yes, absolutely.

If you want to get more control and unlimited features see the pricing here.
title: Is Contentrain free ?

content:
- Easy to integrate
- Real-time collaboration

- Content marketplace
- See for more features here.
title: What is the difference between Contentrain and other headless CMS?

content:
The Contentrain is a web-based platform and runs on all modern desktop browsers. 

-    Google Chrome
-    Mozilla Firefox
-    Opera
-    Apple Safari
-    Microsoft Edge


Note that Contentrain does not support mobile browsers.
title: Which browsers does Contentrain support?

content: Contentrain is an extremely useful git-based headless CMS for developers, marketers, freelance content editors, startups, agencies, corporates, or anyone who publishes their content through Git.
title: Who is Contentrain for?
